turnstile.validation.domains_field.min_l: At least 1 domain must be added
turnstile.page_description: Turnstile is Cloudflareu2019s smart CAPTCHA alternative. It can be embedded into any website without sending traffic through Cloudflare, and works without showing visitors a CAPTCHA.
turnstile.pagedescription: Embed a smart CAPTCHA alternative into any website without sending traffic through Cloudflare
turnstile.overview.subtitle: Turnstile widgets
turnstile.overview.description: Every instance of Turnstile belongs to a Turnstile widget. It is configured on a per-widget level. Every widget has a mode, a label, a sitekey, and a secret key
turnstile.overview.usage: You have used %{current_number} of %{max_number} available widgets.
turnstile.overview.table.name: Widget Name
Successfully deleted **%{smart_count}** widget. |||| Successfully deleted **%{smart_count}** widgets.
There was an error deleting the selected **%{smart_count}** widget. Please try again. |||| There was an error deleting the selected **%{smart_count}** widgets. Please try again.
turnstile.analytics.title: Turnstile analytics
turnstile.analytics.api_solve_rate.label: API Solve Rate
turnstile.analytics.top_actions.title: Top Actions
turnstile.analytics.top_actions.descript: Top Actions refer to the the custom labels created by the consumers for their widgets.
turnstile.analytics.last_24_hours.label: Data from last 24 hours
turnstile.analytics.widgets_mode.label: Widget Mode
turnstile.add_widget_card.description: Add a site to get started with Turnstile.
turnstile.add_turnstile_widget_page.desc: Add a site to get started with Turnstile.
turnstile.add_turnstile_widget_page.form: Add a name for the widget to identify it in the future
Enter your website's hostname or select from your existing websites on Cloudflare. (eg. domain.com or sub.domain.com)
turnstile.add_turnstile_widget_page.keys: Note: you will be able to view your keys again later.
turnstile.add_turnstile_widget_page.succ: You can now configure your website to use Turnstile:
turnstile.edit_turnstile_widget_page.clo: Deleting **%{sitename}** is permanent and cannot be undone.
Deleting widgets is permanent and cannot be undone.

Make sure you stop using the sitekey before deleting the site to prevent your visitors from seeing an error message. |||| Make sure you stop using the sitekeys before deleting the widgets to prevent your visitors from seeing an error message.
Are you sure you want to delete %{smart_count} widget? |||| Are you sure you want to delete %{smart_count} widgets?
turnstile.edit_turnstile_widget_page.rot: Are you sure you want to rotate your secret token for **%{sitename}**?

Rotating the token will generate a new secret while still allowing the previous one to function for **two hours**. This action cannot be undone. Make sure to update your applications with the new secret token as soon as possible.
Your secret token has been successfully rotated for **%{sitename}**.

Rotating the token will generate a new secret while still allowing the previous one to function for **two hours**. This action cannot be undone. Make sure to update your applications with the new secret token as soon as possible.
turnstile.turnstile_widget_analytics_pag: In order to get started with Turnstile, embed the JavaScript code
turnstile.widget.sitekey.label: Site Key
turnstile.widget.secretkey.label: Secret Key
turnstile.widget.secretkey.disclaimer: Please note you can only rotate your secret key once every 2 hours. Your old secret key will be valid while the new secret key is being updated.
turnstile.widget.action.label: Action
turnstile.widget.mode.invisible.label: Invisible
turnstile.widget.mode.invisible.descript: Invisible challenge that does not require interaction.
turnstile.widget.mode.non_interactive.de: A purely non-interactive challenge. Users will see a widget with a loading bar while the browser challenge is run.
turnstile.widget.mode.managed.label: Managed
turnstile.widget.mode.managed.descriptio: Cloudflare will use information from the visitor to decide if an interactive challenge should be used. If we do show an interaction, the user will be prompted to check a box (no images or text to decipher).
turnstile.add_turnstile_widget_page.form: Would you like to opt for pre-clearance for this site?

You can opt to let your Turnstile widget issue a clearance cookie, as if the user had passed a challenge on your Cloudflare proxied website. The cookie will be valid for the challenge passage time specified <0>in your website's security settings</0>
turnstile.widget.clearance_level.js_chal: Allows a user with a clearance cookie of this level to not be challenged by JavaScript Challenge Firewall Rules.
turnstile.widget.clearance_level.managed: Allows a user with a clearance cookie of this level to not be challenged by Managed Challenge or JavaScript Challenge Firewall Rules
turnstile.widget.clearance_level.interac: Allows a user with a clearance cookie of this level to not be challenged by Interactive, Managed or JavaScript Challenge Firewall Rules
